T02TD2464E:140b-1: bi shuddha darsha na tsarya au pa de sha n'a ma /
T02TD2464E:140b-3: lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba /
T02TD2464E:140b-4: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2464E:140b-5: rmi lam lta bur phyi rol min //
T02TD2464E:140b-6: sgyu ma lta bur bden don med //
T02TD2464E:140b-7: nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid bral //
T02TD2464E:140b-8: chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD2464E:140b-10: rgya chen sems can don la mkhas //
T02TD2464E:140b-11: tshogs gnyis dbyer med lam gyi mchog / stong nyid snying rje'i snying po bsgom //
T02TD2464E:140b-12: lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba kha che'i rigs kyi pandi ta chen po dpal chos kyi sh'akya shr'i bha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2464E:140b-14: // / mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis khro phu bzang lung du bsgyur ba'i /
